origin.thorigins.fox.name: Fox
origin.thorigins.fox.description: Vulpes Are Known For Their Cunning. They Hide In Shadows, Attack Unexpectedly And Strike At Their Enemies' Weakest.
fox.thdash.name: §6§l§nPounce
fox.thdash.description: By sacrificing defence, pounce forward and boost your attack while falling down.
thdash.key:
Press [%s] to pounce forward

§8Keybind Used:
Origins - Active Power (Primary)
thdash.info:
§6§lPounce§r during §4right time§r at §9right angle§r §fwill boost your attack §oeven more§r

§8§oFoxes are believed to pounce more accurately §lwhen hunting§r §8§oif they are aligned with the Earth's §lmagnet§r§8§oic field§r
fox.thstorage.name: §6§l§nMouth Pouch
thorigins.thstorage.key:
Active ability, press [%s] to store items in your mouth

§8Keybind Used:
Origins - Active Power (Secondary)
thstorage.info: Stored items won't drop upon death
fox.thfoxify.name: §6§l§nFoxify
fox.thfoxify.description: Become a literal fox when sleeping, and be able to yoink a fox away on an adventure with you.
thfoxify.key0:
§b1. §rStand still, crouch and press [%s] to enter [§5Sleepin Mode§r].
If you are riding, press [%s] to enter [§5Sleepin Mode§r] §rdirectly.
§8Exit this mode via moving
thfoxify.key1:
§b2. §rWhile empty handed, crouch and press [%s] on a fox to put it on your head.
Use [%s] while empty handed to drop the fox.
thfoxify.key2:
§b3. §rWhile empty handed, press [%s] on a fox to drop its item.
Press [%s] on a fox to command it to sit.
thfoxify.key3: §b4. §rAim at a player and press [%s] to mount on them.
thfoxify.info1: §b1. §rPress [%s] to align the fox in your current direction
thfoxify.info2: §b2. §rPress [%s] to toggle fox visibility in your screen. Or if you are riding, exit [§5Sleepin Mode§r§f]
thfoxify.info4:
To change into §aother types of fox§r, use command 
§6/trigger foxtype set [§aNumber§r§6]§r

§a0§r Red Fox
§a1§r Snow Fox
§a2§r Red Fox Pup
§a3§r Snow Fox Pup
§a4§r Revert to §a0§r

§a-1§r Disable [§5Sleepin Mode§r]
§a5§r Enable [Figura Mode]
§a6§r Enable [Figura Mode](Pup Sounds)
thfoxify.keybind.info:
Keybinds Used:
§a1§r. Sprint - [%s]
§a2§r. Drop - [%s]
§a3§r. Use - [%s]
§a4§r. Save Hotbar Activator - [%s]
§a5§r. Swap Item With Offhand - [%s]
thfoxify.error: §cError Sizes Detected, Foxification is forced to end
thfoxify.info6:
Other FoxType Utilities
Use §6/trigger foxtype §c§ladd§r §6[§aNumber§r§6]§r

§a10§r §5Toggle Nightvision Fix§r
§8For when passive nightvision is bugged by shaders / mods

§a20§r §4Refresh Powers§r
§8For when your powers are not working due to Server sudden shut down etc.
fox.thhunt.name: §6§l§nHunt
fox.thhunt.description: Hide yourself by crouching and enter a hunting phase after much preparation.
thhunt.key: Active ability, double tap and hold [%s] to start preparing for a hunt
thhunt.info0:
In Hunt Phase, you deal increased damage and are able to perform §5§lEXTRA STRIKE§r

§8§oIf you're sneaky enough, even your predators won't notice you
thhunt.info1:
Your §5§lEXTRA STRIKE§r has the following effects:
§b1§r. Applies Weakness + Nausea to your target
§b2§r. Deals a small amount of ❂§lTRUE DAMAGE§r
§b3§r. Feeds you Foodpoints and Saturation
§b4§r. Extends the Hunt
fox.thswift.name: §a§nAgility
fox.thswift.description: You have specialized limbs that enhance sprinting and jumping abilities, and you're more resilient to fall damage.
thswift.info:
[§a+§r] Faster speed and higher jumping when sprinting
[§a+§r] Sprint a little bit faster when not holding an item
[§a+§r] Ignore fall distance < 24
[§a+§r] §e§nCrouch§r when §6landing§r will neglect §lmost§r of the fall damage
fox.thsmol.name: §e§nSmol
fox.thsmol.description: Being a fox, you're shorter and have less endurance. But monsters will have a harder time noticing you.
thsmol.info:
[§e~§r] Shrinked sizes
[§c-§r] Reduced max health
[§a+§r] Less noticable to mobs
fox.thweak.name: §c§nWeak
fox.thweak.description: You were born with slender limbs, which restrict you from using shield and performing well in heavy armors, weapons.
thweak.info:
[§c-§r] Cannot use shield
[§c-§r] Equipping heavy armors limits your strength and mobility
[§c-§r] Have less air when under water
thweak.info1: [§c-§r] Using Mace is not a good idea
fox.thfoxiality.name: §e§nFoxiality
fox.thfoxiality.description: Embrace your fox nature and thrive.
thfoxiality.info:
[§a+§r] Permanent Night Vision when no <§eLights§r> in Offhand
[§a+§r] Higher damage against prey mobs
[§a+§r] Ignore berry bushes
[§a+§r] Breaking berry bushes gives you sweet berries
[§a+§r] Receive a random item when waking up
[§c-§r] Can't fall asleep when not under shades
[§a+§r] Do more damage to Merling and Avian
[§c-§r] Receive more damage from Blazeborn
[§a+§r] Dig extremely fast with claws(empty handed)
[§a+§r] Boosted Pickup Range
[§a+§r] Climb in Powder Snow
[§a+§r] Trusted by foxes
[§c-§r] Anger wolves and polar bears
[§c-§r] Wolves and polar bears receive Speed Buffs when targeting you
thfoxiality.info1: [§c-§r] Predators do a deadlier §5§lEXTRA STRIKE §r§fto you after every hit
thfoxiality.info1_legacy: [§c-§r] Wolf and Polar Bear deal more damages to you
thfoxiality.info2:
Your Predators' §5§lEXTRA STRIKE§r has the following effects:
§b1§r. Applies §5Slowness§r + Weakness + Nausea to you
§b2§r. Deals a §egreater§r amount of ❂§lTRUE DAMAGE§r
§b3§r. Temporarily §cDisables§r your [§6§lPounce§r]
§b4§r. Temporarily §cNullifies§r your [§aAgility§r]'s first effect
§b5§r. Temporarily §cDisables§r your natural regeneration

§8§oWearing armors and Resistance might make your predators' §lEXTRA STRIKE §r§8§ofail
fox.thfluffy.name: §e§nFluffy
fox.thfluffy.description: Shaggy fur provides excellent cold protection but is highly flammable.
thfluffy.info:
[§c-§r] Receive more fire and explosion damage
[§a+§r] Freeze Immunity
[§c-§r] Slow down when in water / rain for a bit
[§e~§r] Stand Still to Shake and dry off
fox.thshy.name: §c§nTimidity
fox.thshy.description: Survival instincts make you fear predators, death, crowds, and danger, but there are ways to conquer the fears.
thshy.info0:
[§c-§r] Shake, and get Weakness + Speed effects when:
§b1§r. Near §cPolar Bear§r / §cWolf§r / §6Villager§r / §1Warden§r / §7Wither§r / §5Ender Dragon§r
§b2§r. Spawn of §eLightning§r
§b3§r. Low §cHealth§r
§b4§r. In the other 2 Dimensions
§b5§r. Near Human / Enderian / Blazeborn / Shulk Origin Player

[§c-§r] Can't fall asleep when the above effects are present
thshy.info1: Press [%s] against a §dTamed §cWolf§r §fto not fear them
thshy.info2:
[§e~§r] To Conquer the Fears:
§b1§r. §6Villager§r: Obtain [§5Hero Of the Village§r]
§b2§r. §1Warden§r: Kill §43§r Wardens
§b3§r. §7Wither§r: Kill §41§r Wither
§b4§r. §5Ender Dragon§r: Kill §41§r Ender Dragon
§b5§r. §eLightning§r: Struck by Lightning §516§r times
§b6§r. Low §cHealth§r: Die & Respawn §58§r times
§b7§r. In the End / Nether: Stay for §310§r Minutes in respective dimensions
§b8§r. Near Certain Origins: §dInteracted§r §fby them
thshy.info3: While the Fear effects are present, hold [%s] to highlight the entity fear causes within 15 blocks
fox.thfood.name: §e§nUnique Taste
fox.thfood.description: Your food preferences are heavily influenced by your nature.
thfood.info:
[§a+§r] Buffed foodpoints / saturation from berries and fox preys' meat, get regeneration 1 after consuming
[§c-§r] Nerfed most other foods by 50%
[§a+§r] Have a chance to not consume / receive a random potion effect after consuming berries
[§a+§r] No negative effects from rotten meat / raw chicken
fox.thhunger.name: §e§nFast-Paced
fox.thhunger.description: Your small body has a fast metabolism, granting higher attack speed but requiring frequent large food intake.
thhunger.info:
[§c-§r] Easier to get hungry
[§a+§r] Boosted attack speed
[§c-§r] Hunger will §c§lgreatly§r lower your damage output
fox.thsound.name: §a§nFox Sound Pack
fox.thsound.description: In case it isn't obvious, foxes aren't players
fox.cant_sleep_shade: Your fox instinct forces you to sleep under shades!
fox.cant_sleep_fear: You're too scared to fall asleep!
fox.cant_sleep_hunt: You're hunting! Don't slack it off!
death.attack.thorigins:predator_bite.pla: %1$s couldn't escape the claws and fangs of %2$s.
death.attack.thorigins:foxie_bite.item: %1$s underestimated how feral %2$s with their %3$s can be in a fight.
death.attack.thorigins:predator_bite.ite: %1$s was eviscerated to an unrecognizable shape by a %3$s-wielding %2$s.
fox.wakeup.item: You Found <%s> When You Were Asleep!
fox.feeder: §dYou granted %s §bthe fox§r§d with berries as a little treat :3
fox.hug: §dYou gave %s §dthe little critter a little hug :3
fox.trusted: §dWholesome Interaction! You are now trusted by them
layer.thorigins.foxsize.name: body size
origin.foxsize.m.name: Default Size (M)
origin.foxsize.m.description: The default size, shorter than a human
power.foxsize.m.name: 0.7x Height / Width
power.foxsize.m.description: Cannot enter 1-block hole without crawling. Disguise Fox from [§6§l§nFoxify§r] is normal-sized.
origin.foxsize.s.name: Smaller (S)
power.foxsize.s.name: 0.62x Height / Width
origin.foxsize.xs.name: Extra Smaller (XS)
origin.foxsize.xs.description: The smallest size setting you can get from me >:3
power.foxsize.xs.name: 0.5x Height / Width
figura_on: §dFigura Mode§r §aON§r, §byour hitbox and eye height is shrunk according to the§r §6Fox Avatar
figura_off:
§dFigura Mode§r §cOFF§r, §byour hitbox and eye height is resetted.
§eExit§r §band§r §eRe-enter§r §bthe world if §f§nall of your powers disappear

It appears that you are in a §cForge Server§r!

tie_dupe: §bYou can only leash §c1§b entity at the same time!
